exceptions.exn: The reference HnotP was not found in the current environment.

original: intros P. pose proof (Decidable.decidable P) as H. destruct H as [HP | HnotP]. - right. intros HnP. apply HnotP. intros HP. apply HnP. left. apply HP. - left. intros HnotnotP. apply HnotP. intros HP. apply HnotnotP. right. apply HP.
